About

About the game.

About

Kingdom Quest is a VR adventure that takes place in the fictional village of Tarrin. All was peacerful in the village until one day, the evil Lord Nakhi invaded the land and brought distruction to all those who defied him. It is up to you travel to Nakhi's castle and destroy the evil once and for all!

How To Playh the game

Game controls

How to Play

No remote

If you are playing Kingdom Quest without the remote then it is advised to play on the Google Cardboard.

To walk you must look down

To fire your weapon tap the google box button or shay "shoot".

To interact with objects tap the Google Carboard button.

To change the bow state say "menu"

No remote
